name: Pocketman Teal
description:
"IN POCKETMAN TEAL, YOU GOT TO COLLECT THE ALL! JORNEY THROU 8 AMAZING WORLD, DEFEAT THE 70 JIM LEDER, AND CACH ALMOS 1400** POCKETMANS! YOR HEAD WIL EXPLOD AT INCREDABILITY!!

GO! GO AND CATCH THE POCKETSMAN!"

**(ROUNDING UP FROM 19)

---

Pocketman Teal is a faux-bootleg game (based off a certain popular Nintendo franchise) created for Kusojam. Created in one week, it's a monster tamer RPG experience you'll never forget. ... For one reason or another.

Controls use the keyboard. WASD to move, space to interact/advance text, and enter to use the status menu.
